content:
org.hl7.fhir.r4.model.Parameters:
I can see the add() method but I don't see the remove()/removeAll() methods. anyone knows how to delete parameter(s) by name?

I would think this may work. did not test it yet:
record.getParameter().removeIf(param-> param.getValue().equals(new StringType("cert_no")));
or use: .getNamedProperty("cert_no")
